package.name: sensors_fusion_pkg
package.description: End-to-end demo that fuses a **128-beam LiDAR** and an **Intel RealSense RGB-D** camera to create a 2-D occupancy grid in real time. The grid marks **free ground**, **obstacles** (people, rocks, debris), and **unknown** cells, updating at **â‰¥ 6 Hz** on a Jetson Orin NX. Mock sensors data included.
